SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: /* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentDtoList */ SELECT A.* , WV.VOTE , ( SELECT CP.PREFER FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND CP.COMMENT_NO = A.COMMENT_NO AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} ) AS "PREFER" FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME , C.USE_YN FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.REGPE_ID = U.USER_ID AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getLowCommentDtoList */ SELECT A.* , WV.VOTE , ( SELECT CP.PREFER FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND CP.COMMENT_NO = A.COMMENT_NO AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} ) AS "PREFER" FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME , C.USE_YN FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} AND C.PARENT = #{parent} AND U.USER_ID = C.REGPE_ID ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentDto */ SELECT A.* , WV.VOTE FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.COMMENT_NO = #{comment_no} AND C.REGPE_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY C.REG_DTS DESC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID WHERE 1 = 1
